title: SK∞ (SK8 the Infinity)
synopsis: High school student Reki Kyan is passionate about one thing: skateboarding. When night falls, he heads to "S," an illegal underground race inside a mine where skaters compete in highly dangerous situations. After a loss that results in his skateboard being destroyed and his arm being broken, Reki is now incapable of practicing at all.
voices: ['Hatanaka, Tasuku', 'Kobayashi, Chiaki', 'Nagatsuka, Takuma', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Ono, Kensho', 'Miyake, Kenta']
staff: [['Utsumi, Hiroko', ['Director']], ['Mima, Masafumi', ['Sound Director']], ['Hasui, Takahiro', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ookouchi, Ichirou', ['Series Composition']]]
